snippet: The Inter-American Court of Human Rights has ruled that a 20-year-old amnesty law does not cover war crimes committed during El Salvador’s long civil war.
lead_paragraph: The Inter-American Court of Human Rights has ruled that a 20-year-old amnesty law does not cover war crimes committed during El Salvador’s long civil war.

headline.main: El Salvador: Court Orders Investigation of 1981 Massacre
